criteria.name: Innovation
criteria.description: How novel and creative is the solution? Does it introduce new ideas or approaches that haven't been seen before?

criteria.name: Technical Complexity
criteria.description: How technically challenging is the implementation? Consider the use of advanced algorithms, integrations, and overall engineering quality.

criteria.name: Presentation
criteria.description: How well did the team communicate their idea? Consider clarity, engagement, and the quality of demos or slides.

criteria.name: Potential Impact
criteria.description: What is the potential real-world impact of this project? Consider scalability, market fit, and social benefit.

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: How complete is the project? Is it a working prototype or just an idea? Consider functionality and polish.
